snippet.title: The Séance of Blake Manor | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Announced during The Mix, The Séance of Blake Manor is coming to Steam (PC) from Spooky Doorway and Raw Fury! 

WISHLIST NOW - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1395520/The_Seance_of_Blake_Manor/

The Séance of Blake Manor is a supernatural detective mystery, set in 1897 Ireland, where you investigate the disappearance of Evelyn Deane in a remote hotel full of secrets and other-worldly occurrences. 

As Detective Declan Ward, you’ll interview and interrogate an eclectic group of suspects to learn more about their motivations and unearth any clues they may be hiding.  

Record the details in Declan’s journal, then use your findings to uncover the truth about Blake Manor and the mysterious séance that has brought these unusual guests together.

BlueSky: https://bsky.app/profile/spookydoorway.bsky.social  
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/spookydoorway/ 
Discord: discord.gg/spookydoorwaygames
